common.reset_message:
Continuing will discard all your changes. 
 This message will not display again
common.leave_tab_confirmation: You have unsaved changes, continue anyway?

index.entry_in_replacement_message: Media is still being saved. Please wait or try again later.

convert.wait: Please wait while media is processing

error.resolution_not_supported: The editor is not supported on this screen size
error.orientation_not_supported: To view the Editor, please adjust your device to Landscape
error.conv_fail: Entry conversion failed, cannot create quiz.
error.live_clipping_not_ready: Please be patient, media will soon be ready

welcome.intro:
Press Start to create a new quiz.
A copy of the media will be created and the original media will stay intact.

general.name: Quiz Name
general.welcome_txt: In this video, you will be given a Quiz. Good Luck!
general.invideo_hb: The following text will be displayed:
general.invideo_txt: "All questions must be answered. The quiz will be submitted at the end."
general.questions_list_hb: Allow viewers to download the list of questions before starting the quiz

exp.edit_answer_hb: Allow viewers to change their answers before submitting the quiz.
exp.skip_hb: Your viewers will be able to skip a question and come back to answer it later
exp.banSeek_hb: Users will not be able to use the seek bar to navigate the video past the point they viewed.
exp.do_not_allow_skip_hb: Users must submit an answer before proceeding forward.
exp.allow_skip_hb: Users will be presented with the 'skip for now' button.
exp.alert_txt_default: Seeking was disabled on this video.
exp.alert_text_ph: Set a message for the end users when trying to seek

score.title: Upon Submission:
score.no_score_hb: A 'Thank You' message will display after submitting the quiz.
score.yes_score_hb: Your viewers will see the quiz score page after the quiz is submitted.
score.allow_retake_hb: Allow viewers to take the quiz more than once.
score.feedback_hb: Your viewers will be able to see correct/incorrect answers

ques.title: How to Create a Question
ques.txt:
While watching the video, press pause where you want a question.
Press the '+' button to add a question and related answers
Don’t forget to shuffle the answers!
You can add and edit as much as you like

question.true-false_description: Questions with the choice of True or False
question.multi-answers_description: Question with only one correct answer
question.unsaved_warn: Are you sure you want to proceed? Any unsaved changes will be lost
question.empty_ans: There is an empty answer box, please fill it in
question.delete_warn: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
question.contact_admin_tooltip: Please contact your admin to enable this feature

player.label: Player
player.jump_to_start: Jump to start of selected range
player.jump_to_end: Jump to end of selected range

home.title_subtext: To create engaging content such as interactive quizzes, clips and trimmed videos easily.

editor.save_as_submitted_quiz: This quiz was previously submitted, therefore cannot be changed. You are allowed to create a copy
editor.save_as_ongoing_live: The live recording is ongoing has not been finalized yet. You can save a copy or try again later
editor.title: Video Editor

exit_dialog.message: Are you sure you want to exit?

save_as_dialog.header: Save a Copy of the Media
save_as_dialog.enter_name: Enter a title for the new media

editor.split_not_supported: Oops. It seems that you have used the Split tool. Splitting is not supported while the live recording has not been finalized. Please try again later

save_and_save_as_error.title: Attention
save_and_save_as_error.message: Oops, It appears you are trying to create a zero-length media. Please try again

save_dialog.override_message:
You are about to permanently change this media entry.
This action cannot be undone.
This Process may take a while.
save_dialog.save_warn: Are you sure you want to continue?
save_dialog.save_in_progress: Saving is in progress... Please be patient.
save_dialog.save_complete_no_auto_approved: Note that your media must be approved by the application administrator. Until the version is approved, the original version will be displayed.

editor.conversion_error_message: An error occurred while trying to convert the media. Please try again later.
editor.trimming_failed_error_message: An error occurred while trying to save the media. Please try again later.

timeline.frames_error_message: * Frames preview are not supported for this type of media

player.protected_zone: Can't add hotspot on the protected zone

advertisements.unsaved_warn: Are you sure you want to proceed? Any unsaved changes will be lost

adDetails.name: Ad Name
adDetails.overlayDescription:
Overlay
While the entry is playing, a banner will appear on the screen.
adDetails.videoDescription:
Video Ad
The entry will stop playing, the ad will play, and then the entry will resume.

errors.entryLoadingFailed: An error occurred while trying to load entry.
errors.adsLoadingFailed: An error occurred while trying to load advertisements for current entry.
errors.unableToLoad: Unable to load advertisements for current entry, please verify selected entry.
errors.unableToAddAd: Unable to add advertisement for selected time frame.
errors.general: An error occurred, please contact support
errors.savingFailed: An error occurred while trying to save advertisements.
errors.uploadFailed: An error occurred while trying to read advertisements XML file.
errors.downloadFile: Unable to perform file download for entry
errors.loadAdDetailsFailed: An error occurred while trying to load selected Ad details

hotspots.title: Hotspots
hotspots.pre_activate_message: Sorry! Hotspots aren't currently available for the current media.
hotspots.invalid_time_exceed_entry_length: Provided time should be less than the entry length

timeline_section.start_time_later_than_end_time: Start time should be earlier than end time
timeline_section.end_time_earlier_than_start_time: End time should be later than start time
timeline_section.end_time_later_than_entry_length: End time should be earlier than entry length

delete_message.text: Are you sure you want to delete this hotspot?
delete_message.title: Delete Hotspot

errors.saveErrorText: Changes were not saved, please try again
